caption: In a room with only one window, sunlight streamed in, indicating that it was daytime outside. Inside the room, some individuals were engaged in a conversation, and among them, there appeared to be a deceased person whose presence loomed large. Others in the room were discussing matters related to this individual. Among them was a shifty-looking person who engaged in conversation with the others. They exchanged words, and then, on a snowy mountain, a place covered in snow, a person lay on the ground with a drawn bow. He released an arrow, targeting one person and then another. The people nearby immediately rushed in, surrounding the group that had been attacked, and they killed them. Only one woman was captured by them, becoming their captive directly.
